mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", u2.user_id AS "createBy.userId", u2.username AS "createBy.username", a.create_date AS "createDate", u4.user_id AS "updateBy.userId", u4.username AS "updateBy.username", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.face_value AS "faceValue", a.coop_Business AS "coopBusiness", a.start_date AS "startDate", a.end_date AS "endDate", a.receive AS "receive", u13.user_id AS "receiver.userId", u13.username AS "receiver.username", a.receive_date AS "receiveDate", a.special AS "special"
LEFT JOIN upms_user u2 ON u2.user_id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN upms_user u4 ON u4.user_id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN upms_user u13 ON u13.user_id = a.receiver
mapper.update: UPDATE meal_roll SET update_by = #{updateBy.userId}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, face_value = #{faceValue}, coop_business = #{coopBusiness}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, receive_date = #{receiveDate}, receive = #{receive}, receiver = #{receiver.userId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO meal_roll( create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, face_value, coop_business, start_date, end_date, receive_date, receive, receiver ) VALUES ( #{createBy.userId}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.userId}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{faceValue}, #{coopBusiness}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{receiveDate}, #{receive}, #{receiver.userId} )

insert into meal_roll
id,
create_by,
create_date,
del_flag,
face_value,
coop_business,

mapper.update:
update meal_roll
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
face_value = #{faceValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
coop_business = #{coopBusiness,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_use = #{isUse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE meal_roll SET update_by = #{updateBy.userId}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, face_value = #{faceValue}, coop_business = #{coopBusiness}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, receive_date = #{receiveDate}, receive = #{receive}, receiver = #{receiver.userId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select
from meal_roll a
where a.face_value like concat('%', #{faceValue}, '%')
ORDER BY #{sort} #{order}
ORDER BY a.update_date desc,id desc

select count(*) from meal_roll
where face_value like concat('%', #{faceValue}, '%')
